Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Waterfront Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Waterfront Way and Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Leviathan Drive, which runs north and south, intersects Waterfront Way, running east to west here. The Dentra Central Archery Range, one of the finest in the lands, is located on the southeastern corner of the intersection, where you can find a number of sharpshooting archers as well as some fletchers and shops to add to your collection of fine bows.
